This week one of my heroes Klaus Schulze passed away. His albums Angst, Moondawn and En=Trance started my interest in electronic music and he was a big inspiration to start experimenting with music. Without his sounds ASOT probably wouldn‚Äôt have started. May he rest in peace ‚ù§Ô∏è
üôè‚ù§Ô∏è
